page.title: 11Farnham Sports Centre
page.content: The Farnham Sports Centre is on a site formerly occupied by a gas works. The centre was opened in{1979}by Mr.A.T.Shaw.It cost 1.1 million pounds to build and last year their takings were Â£208,000. Besides Mr.I.Phelps, the manager, the centre employs{30 people.}There are 31,000 people in Farnham.Between six and seven hundred people visit the Sports Centre each week. In the centre there are{24 clubs } open to the general public. The sports played are hockey, netball,volleyball basketball,squash,badminton,table tennis and swimming.The most popular sport is{swimming}both in the summer and winter. The Sports Centre has special facilities for the disabled and handicapped and low rates for old aged pensioners.
